alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 04 at 5:56PM CDT until November 04 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... North central Van Zandt County in north central Texas... South central Hopkins County in north central Texas... Southeastern Rains County in north central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Grand Saline, or 10 miles northeast of Canton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lake Fork Reservoir around 625 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Oakland. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
